name: Pippa Kendrick
about: Pippa Kendrick is a food writer focused solely on creating delicious free-from recipes. With personal knowledge of living with serious food intolerances and a passion for good food, she has been inspired to craft gluten, dairy, egg, yeast and soy-free recipes for everyone to enjoy.

Pippa is a home cook and author of two best-selling cookbooks, she loves nothing more than to help inspire people in the kitchen and show them how to effortlessly create recipes that everyone can eat, taking the fear out free-from and celebrating all the wonderful abundance of food open to you. Pippa uses methods from traditional cookery from all over the globe, takes on modern raw food and vegan cuisine in order to create fresh, vibrant and delicious food for all to enjoy.
